title: Sonos CONNECT
description:
Sonos CONNECT is an audio streaming device that connects to equipment you already own. Just hook up CONNECT to your stereo, home theater, or powered speakers and stream all the music on Earth wirelessly in any room. Control with the Sonos Controller App.

Sonos Your Home 
All your music in every room in amazing HiFi sound. Wirelessly.  

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Sonos Home Audio products. Shop for the Sonos CONNECT and the full line of Sonos Home Audio products at Abt!
